cleaned_text: Colon cleansing can help improve your body's overall health and wellness, and may even reduce your risks for colon cancer. It makes the digestive system more effective, Maintains regularity and prevents constipation, Increases energy, Increases the body's absorption of vitamins and nutrients, Improves concentration, Kick-starts weight loss etc.
